channel.title: Siege of Kings
channel.description:
[center] [b][size=14pt]Siege of Kings[/size][/b]
Siege of Kings is a 2d java game by BCoding.
[b][url=https://twitter.com/BCodingOfficial]Follow us on Twitter[/url][/b]
[b]Gameplay[/b] Siege of Kings is a real time strategy game, similar to Starcraft or Warcraft. The game is based in the medieval era. The object is to defeat opposing team(s) by destroying their structures and units.
[b]The Team[/b] The team currently consists of only me. In the future I will be in need of a sprite artist, web developer, and a sound artist. If you would like to apply for one of the afformentioned positions, please contact me on my skype: [u]bradley.carels[/u]
[b]Media[/b] [i]Current graphics are only placeholders, a sprite artist will be hired in the future[/i]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/mapmaker.png[/img] [/center]

[center]
[size=14pt]Siege of Kings[/size]

Siege of Kings is a 2d java game by BCoding.

Follow us on Twitter

Gameplay
Siege of Kings is a real time strategy game, similar to Starcraft or Warcraft. The
game is based in the medieval era. The object is to defeat opposing team(s) by
destroying their structures and units.

The Team
The team currently consists of only me. In the future I will be in need of a sprite
artist, web developer, and a sound artist. If you would like to apply for one of the
afformentioned positions, please contact me on my skype: bradley.carels

Media
Current graphics are only placeholders, a sprite artist will be hired in the future
